trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Laconia
There were no other sightings in Laconia on or around December 14th 2010
divs: sighting detailshere's a copy band paste from my e-mail: "while reading my paper files here in gilmanton where i live i looked out the window and saw this black ball in the sky, that i first thought was a balloon floating up there in the nw sky, but then upon going outside for a better look above the trees it was moving too fast, in a beeline from nw to ne and a little bit south, so you might want to contact the police departments of the towns and cities to the east of here and a bit south to be on the lookout for whatever this is if it continues in this same direction and might be seen with a camera? mailing address: *(wit's name and address deleted--cms\sg).
